summary: Most requested layout and styling changes are implemented: desktop header nav is right-aligned with larger link-style items, smooth scrolling is preserved, and active-section highlighting is added via an IntersectionObserver hook. Sections (Home/About/Services/Contact) and global styling were significantly enhanced with a cohesive theme. However, several additional unrelated changes (SEO/runtime hooks, deployment docs, placeholder query hooks) appear beyond the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added SEO/meta/runtime SEO features and components not requested (e.g., SEO meta tags, SeoStructuredData component, runtime SEO hook).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on layout/theme/navigation for a single-page site and explicitly lists non-goals around adding unrelated integrations; SEO additions were not requested.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (frontend/src/App.tsx summary mentions SeoStructuredData + runtime SEO hook)
frontend-file-summaries.txt (frontend/index.html summary mentions comprehensive SEO meta tags, canonical/OG/Twitter URLs updated at runtime)

hallucinated_features.description: Added deployment runbook documentation files not requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request deployment process documentation.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a placeholder React Query hooks file despite no request for React Query integration.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest includes a non-goal of adding backend functionality/persistence; adding React Query scaffolding is not requested by any REQ.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts summary: placeholder file for React Query hooks)

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced enhanced client-side contact form validation and success-state auto-reset behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; requirements focus on layout/theme/navigation and section presentation, not new form behavior/validation logic.
evidence: frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx (added validateForm with field checks; setTimeout reset after submit)
